original_text: And all its fat he shall remove as the fat of the lamb is removed from the sacrifice of peace offerings, and the priest shall burn it on the altar, on top of the Lord's food offerings. And the priest shall make atonement for him for the sin which he has committed, and he shall be forgiven.
korean_text: 그 모든 기름을 화목제 어린 양의 기름을 떼낸 것 같이 떼내어 제단 위 여호와의 화제물 위에서 불사를지니 이같이 제사장이 그가 범한 죄에 대하여 그를 위하여 속죄한즉 그가 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: And all its fat he shall remove
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 모든 기름을 제거해야 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: as the fat of the lamb is removed
from the sacrifice of peace offerings
and the priest shall burn it on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그것을 제단에서 불사를 것이라

sentences.original_text: on top of the Lord's food offerings
And the priest shall make atonement for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그를 위해 속죄할 것이라

sentences.original_text: for the sin which he has committed
